column5: Welcome to our study turned into a small, comfortable bedroom space!  Twin bed, desk, sliding glass door opens to patio. Kitchen & living room available for use!  Our townhome is 1600 sq ft & 2 stories - Great location in Dallas next to major highways - 12 minutes to Uptown, 15 to downtown, 8 minutes to Addison restaurants & nightlife, 25 minutes to both airports.
